text.Prompt: Can you tell me how to deal with an ex boyfriend who wants more space?
text.Response A:
Respect his wishes.
Define rules about phone and other e-contact.
Develop approaches for social interactions.
Reach an agreement.
Prevent outbursts.
Examine why.
Clarify finality.
Consider your compatibility.This may be an occasion when you are simply not compatible.
Let off some steam.
Work the process.
Determine the emotional need he fulfilled.
Appreciate the positive qualities and learning experiences.
Say goodbye.
Gain perspective.
Fight insecurities.
Build self-esteem through specific events.
Explore your options.
Seek professional help.
Renew your belief in healthy relationships.When you feel up to it, reaffirm that you believe in the possibility of having a healthy relationship.
Allow for sad moments.
Remind the world.
Welcome him back with conditions.
Be self-reliant.Happiness is an inside job and you are responsible to create it.
text.Response B:
Prepare a resume.
Give an impressive interview.
Be willing to go through a training process.
Improve your computer skills.
Be punctual.
Learn from your supervisors.
Stay up to date with your company's activities.
Keep a positive outlook.
Develop your communication skills.
Be polite.
Handle upset customers.
Shorten excessive conversation.
Make a good impression.
Transfer the call if necessary.

67.displayed_text:
Prompt

Can you tell me how to deal with an ex boyfriend who wants more space?

Response A

Respect his wishes.
Define rules about phone and other e-contact.
Develop approaches for social interactions.
Reach an agreement.
Prevent outbursts.
Examine why.
Clarify finality.
Consider your compatibility.This may be an occasion when you are simply not compatible.
Let off some steam.
Work the process.
Determine the emotional need he fulfilled.
Appreciate the positive qualities and learning experiences.
Say goodbye.
Gain perspective.
Fight insecurities.
Build self-esteem through specific events.
Explore your options.
Seek professional help.
Renew your belief in healthy relationships.When you feel up to it, reaffirm that you believe in the possibility of having a healthy relationship.
Allow for sad moments.
Remind the world.
Welcome him back with conditions.
Be self-reliant.Happiness is an inside job and you are responsible to create it.

Response B

Prepare a resume.
Give an impressive interview.
Be willing to go through a training process.
Improve your computer skills.
Be punctual.
Learn from your supervisors.
Stay up to date with your company's activities.
Keep a positive outlook.
Develop your communication skills.
Be polite.
Handle upset customers.
Shorten excessive conversation.
Make a good impression.
Transfer the call if necessary.
